name: Clouds Ahoy!
description:
Clouds Ahoy! is a frantic coop multiplayer game for 1-4 players. Alone or with friends you make up the crew of a flying Skyship. Master the systems aboard, defend against alien monsters, complete deliveries for local factions, and upgrade your Skyship to survive between the clouds.

In the distant future the earth's surface is flooded and extraterrestrial creatures have invaded the planet. The remaining humans have sought refuge in floating, steam-powered fortresses, high above the ground. As the captain of a Skyship you transport supplies between Skyports to ensure the survival of the inhabitants.

MASTER THE ONBOARD SYSTEMS

Heat the boiler and open the valves to power your engines with steam. Use your tools to maintain the different parts of your Skyship and keep your eyes peeled to spot dangers early. Cooperation and coordination are key to keep your Skyship flying through the increasingly hostile environments.

DEFEND AGAINST ALIEN MONSTERS

Use the onboard cannons to defend against incoming attackers, but keep a gun at the ready in case an alien manages to breach the hull of your Skyship.

UPGRADE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR SKYSHIP

Design your Skyship from the ground up. Replace old parts with better ones and define custom logic to control all aspects of your vessel. Anything is possible!

COMPLETE DELIVERIES FOR LOCAL FACTIONS

Deliver supplies between Skyports to improve your standing with the local factions and to earn money. As you rise in rank new and better items, weapons and building parts are unlocked.
